title: Premade 5 for Starlight
body: We are two decently skilled players looking for three other players for the starlight event. Two of the quests need a premade 5. Recruiting three other players. Anyone up for a few rounds Sunday night?

replies.body: Added everyone but Flammero. You're in the wrong server bro lol.
I'm down. Add me, my IGN is SavageGoddess
can you add me into the group , IGN is EverSpirit
